channel.title: Journey on Data Handyman
channel.description: Recent content in Journey on Data Handyman

item.title: Taking your first step
item.description: Starting out I really started my career as a data analyst. About a year or so after my start date, a great coworker come along who told me he was learning Python. He was writing scripts that made my VBA scripts look like a joke. So I wanted to learn too. This coworker/friend came up with a cool idea to make a little money on the side. We were going to create a Python program to automate some of the tedious aspects of buying and selling products online.
